titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to continue the visa waiver pilot program and to authorize, under certain conditions, the creation of a probationary status for certain participants in the visa waiver pilot program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.

bill.summary: 9/13/1994--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to: (1) extend the visa waiver pilot program; and (2) create a probationary status under such program.
